artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Jōshūya Kinzō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 249, ōban #65.8
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: {Banri ni hito minami ni saru / Sanshun ni kari kita ni tobu} (My friend is leaving for the south ten thousand miles away. / Geese are heading north for the whole spring months through.)
markings: censor seal: 極 {kiwame}; publisher\'s seal: Jōkin
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Anthology of Japanese and Chinese Poems for Recitation (Wakan rōei-shū 和漢朗詠集)
title: Flying Geese and Full Moon
